dmca.title: Pets Unfriendly
dmca.body:
As much as I hate to be the bearer of bad news, I must inform you that we are the owners of the federally registered trademark, Pet Friendly.

This letter is a request for immediate cease and desist of use of our name in any matter that has to do with pets or pet categories.  We are also not licensing the use of our name at this time.  If we find that you do not discontinue use of our name, we will be forced to proceed with legal action.

In the future, before you try to build a business, we recommend that you search through the Department of Commerce web page for names that are available for use without infringement on trademarks.

Sincerely,

[Private]
Vice President
